name: Tank Treads
description:
Welcome to Tank Treads!

Make sure you put Tank Treads in fullscreen, or there will be some weird cut-off edges.

To learn how to play: try the tutorial inside the game, or see below.

     Controls:

(Left Arrow Key / A) = Power Left Tread.

(Right Arrow Key / D) = Power Right Tread.

(Up Arrow Key / W) = Shoot a bullet from your tank.

(Down Arrow Key / S) = Idk it does nothing.

     Other:

My record for points in single player mode is 42. Can you beat it?

     Update Log [Current Ver. - 1.3]

28.6.2019 - v1.0 | Initial release

29.6.2019 - v1.2 | Added Music ingame, randomized target rotations and sizes, fixed bug with the edges (edges were being pushed around by the player / targets and being moved).

29.6.2019 - v1.3 | Fixed sides for multiplayer, lowered wait time until going back to menu after a round of singleplayer.
